https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/qS9iv35GzXUABOeINBF1Mwg8U8R.jpg A documentary about a controversial Zen master who has sought to strip away the sheen off many taboo topics in Zen Buddhism and exhibit a healthy dose of reality to his readers. Brad Warner's Hardcore Zen
